recipe.content:
services:
  client:
    image: eclipse/ubuntu_jdk8
    mem_limit: 2147483648
  server:
    image: eclipse/ubuntu_jdk8
    mem_limit: 1073741824
    volumes_from:
      - client

commands: {"commandLine":"cd /projects/gRPC-sample/ && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true generatePomFileForMavenCustomPublication && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true clean build", "name":"Gradle Build Only", "attributes":{"previewUrl":"", "goal":"Run"}, "type":"mvn"}

{"commandLine":"cd /projects/gRPC-sample/ && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true generatePomFileForMavenCustomPublication && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true clean build && APP_CLASS_PATH=\"/projects/gRPC-sample/build/libs/\" ./scripts/hello-world-server", "name":"Gradle Build-Run Server", "attributes":{"previewUrl":"", "goal":"Run"}, "type":"mvn"}

{"commandLine":"cd /projects/gRPC-sample/ && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true generatePomFileForMavenCustomPublication && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true clean build && APP_CLASS_PATH=\"/projects/gRPC-sample/build/libs/\" ./scripts/hello-world-client", "name":"Gradle Build-Run Client", "attributes":{"previewUrl":"", "goal":"Run"}, "type":"mvn"}

{"commandLine":"wget https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-3.4.1-bin.zip && sudo mkdir /opt/gradle && sudo unzip -d /opt/gradle gradle-3.4.1-bin.zip && ln -s /opt/gradle/gradle-3.4.1/bin/gradle /usr/bin/gradle && cd /projects/gRPC-sample/ && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true generatePomFileForMavenCustomPublication && gradle -Dorg.gradle.daemon=true clean build && APP_CLASS_PATH="/projects/gRPC-sample/build/libs/" ./scripts/hello-world-server", "name":"Setup Build-Run gRPC Server", "attributes":{"previewUrl":"", "goal":"Run"}, "type":"mvn"}
